verses:
Praise ye the Lord in his holy places:  praise ye him in the
firmament of his power.

Praise ye him for his mighty acts:  praise ye him according to
the multitude of his greatness.

Praise him with the sound of trumpet:  praise him with psaltery
and harp.

Praise him with timbrel and choir:  praise him with strings and
organs.

Praise him on high sounding cymbals:  praise him on cymbals of
joy:  let every spirit praise the Lord.  Alleluia.
